text: (nampikkaiyalarkale! Por purinta camayam) ninkal avarkalaik konru vitavillai; allahtan avarkalai konran. (Napiye! Etirikalin mitu) ninkal (mannai) erintapotu (atai) ninkal eriyavillai; allahtan (atai) erintan. Nampikkaiyalarkalai alakana muraiyil cotippatarkakave (ivvaru ceytan.) Niccayamaka allah nanku ceviyurupavan, mika arintavan avan
